body.name: YeYeBest Mop Handle Commercial Heavy Duty - 60 inch Metal Commercial Mop Stick, Adjustable for Industrial & Household Floor Cleaning, 1Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 45 mins
features: Multi-Use - The mop handle is perfect for industrial, commercial and household floor cleaning jobs, can be used to clean tile floors, marble floors, concrete floors and wood floors.
Easy remove and replace - with side gate design allows you quickly slide mop heads on or off.
Anti-slip & Anti-rust - the mop stick is crafted with rustproof steel and non-slip pattern,comfortable to use and easy to maintenance!
Sturdy & durable -1 inch diamater premium steel handle with 8mm extra thick pipe,makes this commercial mop handle more sturdy than fiberglass and wooden made.
More labor saving &efficient - 60 inch long handle is a more ideal length for adult of average and tall height,no more bending over while cleaning your floor,do more with less effort.
【Tips】 This product does not include the fabric mop head part.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Adjustable – A Mopping Marvel
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the Mop Handle Commercial Heavy Duty, and it has proven to be a game-changer in the world of floor cleaning.This 60-inch metal commercial mop stick is a true heavyweight when it comes to durability and performance. The adjustable feature makes it suitable for both industrial and household floor cleaning, providing versatility that meets all my mopping needs.The sturdy construction ensures that this mop handle can withstand rigorous use, making it ideal for commercial spaces. The adjustable length adds a level of convenience, allowing me to customize it to my preferred height for comfortable and efficient cleaning.I appreciate the attention to detail in the design, ensuring a secure grip and easy maneuverability. Whether tackling large industrial floors or everyday household spills, this mop handle gets the job done with ease. It arrived promptly and well-packaged, ready to take on any cleaning challenge.If you're in search of a reliable and heavy-duty mop handle, look no further. The Mop Handle Commercial Heavy Duty is a solid investment that makes floor cleaning a breeze. Five stars well-deserved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice mop - but not the most sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I like an old fashioned mop! A real good cleaning for our floors is so necessary once in a while,, out here in the rurals. The swiffer treatment is good for most of the time. But I need this REAL MOP once in a while. I'm afraid I'm going to break it tho! Because it's divided into pieces, I'm not expecting years of service from this handle. We'll see. I'm not rough on things, but the sheer weight of the cotton head and the swinging back and forth (always mop in a figure-8 pattern), may be too much for this screw assembly handle to bear.Neutral on recommendation. Try at your own risk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YeYeBest Mop Handle Commercial Heavy Duty
reviews.reviewText: The sturdiness of the mop handle is a standout positive aspect. This sturdiness is crucial for handling heavy-duty cleaning tasks, ensuring the mop handle can withstand the demands of both industrial and household use.The overall build quality is highly commendable, further contributing to the durability and reliability of the mop handle. A well-constructed handle is essential for long-lasting performance and effectiveness during cleaning routines.The ease of changing out the mop heads is a practical feature. The quick and straightforward process is a time-saving benefit, making it convenient for users who need to switch out mop heads efficiently.Considering the quality and durability of the mop handle, This adds value for those who are looking for a reliable and robust mop without breaking the bank.The robust clips used to hold the mop head are a positive design choice. The reliance on sturdy clips rather than velcro or thin clips enhances the overall durability and effectiveness of the mop handle.In conclusion, the YeYeBest Mop Handle Commercial Heavy Duty stands out for its sturdiness, build quality, ease of use when changing mop heads, reasonable price for the quality, and robust clips. It comes highly recommended for both industrial and household floor cleaning needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong And Sturdy Great For Outdoor Use
reviews.reviewText: The 60 inch heavy duty commercial mop handle is very sturdy and made to last. The handle did need a little assembly which was extremely easy. It has a nice thick long handIe with cushion padding on several places making handling it very easy. The mop head attachment is simple too, just unhook, slide on the mop head and relatch the hook. I ordered this type of handle to add a heavy duty mop head for outdoor use such as mopping the porch and steps and cleaning off porch furniture. This is definitely the right mop handle to tackle these jobs. A great product to own.
